title: Varinder Bhatia, Joint Vice President- Sales (Solar) at Havells India Ltd. - Energetica India
summary: Havells, an Indian company, is actively involved in the solar energy sector, offering a range of off-grid and on-grid solutions. They are investing heavily in research and development to create innovative, reliable, and cost-effective solar products. The company is seeing significant growth in the Indian market due to the government's initiatives promoting renewable energy adoption and increased consumer awareness.
